title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 385.0 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 385.0 - Scope

State Regulations

This Part sets forth the provisions and requirements of
public assistance and Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP)
employment programs, including the administration of local employment plans. It
also contains work requirements for public assistance and SNAP applicants and
recipients and sanctions for those who fail to comply without good cause with
these requirements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
385.0

Amended

New

York State Register September 4, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 36, eff. 9/4/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
